title: Treacle scones
ingredients: ['225g (8 oz) plain flour', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1/2 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '1 teaspoon of cream of tartar (found in baking section of supermarket)', '1/2 teaspoon cinnamon', '1/2 teaspoon mixed spice or ground ginger', '25g (1 oz) butter', '25g (1 oz) caster sugar', '1 rounded tablespoon black treacle', '120ml (4 fl oz) milk']
